title: Tim Farron – 2021 Comments on Food Standards
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Tim Farron, the Liberal Democrat MP for Westmorland and Lonsdale, on 29 April 2021.

Today Liberal Democrats are launching our new campaign to protect British farmers and maintain our food standards.
